title: Vector Angle
description: In this lab, we will explore the concept of vector angle and learn how to calculate the angle between two vectors using JavaScript. We will use various mathematical functions such as `Math.pow()`, `Math.sqrt()`, and `Math.acos()` to perform the necessary calculations and derive the desired result. Through this lab, we will gain a better understanding of vector operations and their practical applications.

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
